title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.6 - Restrictions on apartments listed
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19 ยง 190.6 - Restrictions on apartments listed

State Regulations

No apartment information vendor or employee thereof shall
refer a prospective tenant to an apartment unless: (a) the apartment information vendor agent
has the written authority of the owner to list the apartment; and
(b) the apartment meets the specifications of
said tenant as set forth in the standard apartment information vendor
contract. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19
ยง
190.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
